styles.name: Bowl Cut
styles.description: The bowl cut is a uniform hairstyle with a straight fringe and equal length hair around the head, resembling a bowl shape.

styles.name: Buzz Cut
styles.description: A buzz cut is a hairstyle featuring uniformly short hair across the entire head, providing a neat, clean look.

styles.name: Sponge Twist ﹢ Fade
styles.description: Top of the head features tightly coiled curls, while sides and back progressively shorten, blending texture with neatness.

styles.name: Corn Rows
styles.description: Tightly braided strips of hair running linearly from the forehead to the back of the scalp.

styles.name: Box Cut
styles.description: Hair is short on the sides and back, with a flat, squared top, creating a distinctive box-like appearance.

styles.name: Curly Top ﹢ High Fade
styles.description: This hairstyle features voluminous curls on top with sides starting high and fading short, creating a stylish contrast.

styles.name: Mid Fade
styles.description: A mid fade is a hairstyle with the hair on the sides and back tapered from longer to shorter, starting midway up the head.

styles.name: Tight Pompadour ﹢ High Fade
styles.description: This style showcases a tall, slicked-back hair mound on top (pompadour) with sides cut short, starting high (high fade)
